programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: A man is falsely imprisoned on a murder charge, then escapes to join an outlaw gang and unmask the real killer.

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: Exasperated pioneers hire the ill-fated Donner Party's former trail guide to escort them back to their original homes.

programme.title: Damsel
programme.desc: Samuel Alabaster, an affluent pioneer, ventures across the American frontier to marry the love of his life, Penelope. As his group traverses the West, the once-simple journey grows treacherous, blurring the lines between hero, villain and damsel.

programme.title: The Dream Chasers
programme.desc: An old shopkeeper (Harold Gould) and a boy (Justin Dana) with cancer hit the road during the Depression, bound for Wyoming.

programme.title: Law of the Valley
programme.desc: A free and peaceful town is saved from outlaws by a group of cowboys.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: The story of Sila and Firman, two child jockeys living in the impoverished island of Sumbawa, where horse racing with young children is a long-established tradition. The stakes are high, but it's the riders who pay the price.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: A man is falsely imprisoned on a murder charge, then escapes to join an outlaw gang and unmask the real killer.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Attacked by Shoshones while crossing a burial ground, Adam discovers that the "Indian" woman tending him is white.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe runs into romantic complications when he tries to teach a deaf girl (Stella Stevens) sign language; guest Albert Salmi.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam and Little Joe try to warn Hoss when he befriends a violent man (Cal Bolder).

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: An Easterner swears revenge for the death of his father, a drunk that a Cartwright killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Range Rider (Jock Mahoney) and Dick (Dick Jones) assist Jean Snyder (Pamela Blake) in building a telegraph line.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A banker, a judge and a rancher had motive to kill a newlywed editor.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Range Rider (Jock Mahoney) and Dick (Dick Jones) help an ex-convict (House Peters Jr.) who is accused of robbing a stage.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A beautiful girl and a jeweler steal gold-bearing stagecoaches.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Range Rider is attacked by three men posing as soldiers who are responsible for a series of robberies spanning the past six months.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: A quick-change artist's gang robs a wagon-carried mine payroll.

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Range Rider (Jock Mahoney) and Dick (Dick Jones) come to the rescue of a millionaire (Erville Alderson) who has lost his memory and his daughter (Elaine Riley).

programme.title: Range Rider
programme.desc: Range Rider and Dick become involved in a political battle when they save a woman and some ballot boxes.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Outlaws terrorize ranchers near Maverick; Buck Grant, using the disguise of the Phantom Rider, battles against bandits.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck escapes death by rolling under a water trough a split second before the dynamite explosion; Spooky tells Buck a crooked deal is planned.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Bucks seems trapped in the burning jail; he whistles for Silver, who wrenches the bars loose and Buck escapes.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck comes to the surface of the lake and swims ashore with Mary; Silver meets his master and they start for the ranch chased by outlaws.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck and Silver land on a jutting shelf of rock below the top of the precipice; Buck gives the wallet, which he took from the safe, to Judge Holmes.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: The bandits drag Buck with them; he gets away on Silver; the captured outlaws try to escape from the sheriff and one of them is shot.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck shoots the gun from his assailant's hand after dropping to the floor to dodge the bullets; next day Buck learns a railroad man is coming to town.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck is cornered by renegades in the cave; Silver lashes out with his heels and Buck rides away, chased by outlaws.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck leaps to his saddle and dashes away; Blake is badly injured, and Mary's papers are gone; The Phantom later sends her a note saying they are safe.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Cowboys rescue Mary and Buck; rustlers steal all Mary's cattle, her only source of money, when she has to meet a note at the bank.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: A fight breaks out between settlers and natives over their shooting ability; Buck bursts from the closet carrying Mary and rushes her to their horses.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Spooky rescues Buck; Mary assures Hudson that Buck is trustworthy; Hudson reveals a secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck grabs Mary and leaps to safety in the mine tunnel, avoiding the explosion; Hudson returns from pursuing the renegade.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck rolls down an embankment and out of the path of the galloping horses; Buck rides off and the bandits head for Hudson's ranch after the gold.

programme.title: The Phantom Rider: 15 Chapter Serial
programme.desc: Buck sees Roscoe in the nick of time; Roscoe is jailed; cowboys drive off his henchmen; Mary is thrown from her horse.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The local postmaster plots to rob a train carrying a valuable bank shipment.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Dale and Roy must convince an 11-year-old boy help catch his outlaw brother.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A bank employee (Stanford Jolley) is forced to join a gang after being framed for embezzlement.
